metadata.synopsis: Gale's nested commented about the Arcane Tower.

1.speaker: Gale
1.text: Ah. Quite. A misadventure from my days as an apprentice at Blackstaff Academy.

5.speaker: Gale
5.text: I was but a child, only a few months into my studies, but already I knew I was destined for greatness. No one believed me, of course, so I decided to prove it. To cast a spell with the Blackstaff itself.

3.speaker: Gale
3.text: From one perspective, I succeeded. I opened a portal. However, instead of pointing it at the first year dormitory, I found myself pulled into limbo, facing a very irritated Death Slaad.

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: Fortunately, the Blackstaff himself came to the rescue, hauling me back from the brink, and straight into several months of writing lines. Or rather, finessing my autograph.

2.speaker: Gale
2.text: Now, much as I enjoy reminiscing about such tomfoolery, I believe we've more pressing matters at hand. Is there anything else?
